docs.snippet: Prosperity for the peoples of the United States and South America, economically, socially and politically depends upon cooperation of private, individual and collective interests, Dr. Alberto Dominguez Campora, Ambassador of Uruguay to the United...
docs.lead_paragraph: Prosperity for the peoples of the United States and South America, economically, socially and politically depends upon cooperation of private, individual and collective interests, Dr. Alberto Dominguez Campora, Ambassador of Uruguay to the United States, declared yesterday at a luncheon of the Pan American Society at the Waldorf-Astoria Hotel.
docs.abstract: Uruguay Amb Dominguez Campora hails unity, s, NYC; stresses close Latin ties with US

headline.main: LATIN ENVOY URGES CLOSE TIES TO U. S.; Uruguayan Ambassador Sees Bolstering of Export Trade as Basis of Prosperity

docs.snippet: Barring a sharp decline in the Argentina peso, a reflection of the demand for dollars in Buenos Aires, there was no particular stir in any of the foreign exchanges last week. Pound sterling, and the free units of Canada and Switzerland, which have...
docs.lead_paragraph: Barring a sharp decline in the Argentina peso, a reflection of the demand for dollars in Buenos Aires, there was no particular stir in any of the foreign exchanges last week. Pound sterling, and the free units of Canada and Switzerland, which have been the focal points of interest recently, showed relative firmness throughout. Business was on a modest scale.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; Week Ended Jan. 14, 1949

docs.snippet: Refusing to return to his Communist-dominated homeland, Dr. Karel Kase, former head of the Latin-American section of the Czechoslovakian Foreign Trade Ministry, has sought asylum in the United States, he revealed here yesterday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Refusing to return to his Communist-dominated homeland, Dr. Karel Kase, former head of the Latin-American section of the Czechoslovakian Foreign Trade Ministry, has sought asylum in the United States, he revealed here yesterday.
docs.abstract: Dr K Kase resigns Foreign Trade Min post and seeks asylum in US

docs.snippet: The foreign exchange market last week was firm on an extremely light turnover. For a period of trading time (one week) it capped the dullness of the preceding three and stamped January as the poorest month, both from the volume involved and resulting...
docs.lead_paragraph: The foreign exchange market last week was firm on an extremely light turnover. For a period of trading time (one week) it capped the dullness of the preceding three and stamped January as the poorest month, both from the volume involved and resulting fluctuations in several years.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; Week Ended Jan. 28, 1949
